# requiredAuthorizations

**Type Property**

The types of authorizations necessary for detecting planes.

## Declaration

```swift
static var requiredAuthorizations: [ARKitSession.AuthorizationType] { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use this property to pass plane detection requirements to the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARKitSession/requestAuthorization(for:)] method.

## Detecting planes

- **init(alignments:)**: Creates a plane detection provider for the types of planes you want to detect.
- **allAnchors**: An array that contains all the plane provider’s anchors.
- **anchorUpdates**: A sequence of updates to planes a provider detects.
- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current runtime environment supports plane detection providers.
